name: server
description: "The server of reflow. It is a customized express App that will feel like home for django developers"

scripts.dev: npm run docker:dev && pm2 kill && pm2 start --interpreter node manage.js --watch --no-daemon -- runserver
scripts.migrate: npm run docker:dev && node manage.js migrate
scripts.stop: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all

author: Reflow Desenvolvimento de Software LTDA
